SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface NetworkClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public interface NetworkClient
The NetworkClient interface represents the contract for a network client in the application. It defines the methods that any communication class protocol implements this interface must provide. Currently, communication protocols are RMI and Socket. The methods in this interface are related to game actions such as login, choosing color, drawing cards etc.

  • Method Details

    • login

      void login(String nickname)
      Logs in the player with the given nickname. This method is used to authenticate a player in the game. It is typically called at the start of the game setup.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.

    • insertNumberOfPlayers

      void insertNumberOfPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
      Inserts the number of players in the game. This method is used to set the number of players that will participate in the game.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - The number of players.

    • chooseColor

      void chooseColor(Color color)
      Chooses the color for the player. This method is used to set the color of the player in the game.
      Parameters:
      color - The color chosen by the player.

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(String sender, String message)
      Sends a chat message. This method is used to send a chat message to the other players in the game.
      Parameters:
      sender - The nickname of the player who sent the message.
      message - The message sent by the player.

    • chooseSideStartingCard

      void chooseSideStartingCard(boolean side)
      Chooses the side of the starting card for the player. This method is used to set the side of the starting card of the player in the game.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the starting card chosen by the player.

    • chooseSecretObjectiveCard

      void chooseSecretObjectiveCard(int indexCard)
      Chooses the secret objective card for the player. This method is used to set the secret objective card of the player in the game. It is typically called at the start of the game setup.
      Parameters:
      indexCard - The index of the secret objective card chosen by the player.

    • playCard

      void playCard(int indexHand, Point position, boolean side)
      Plays a card from the player's hand. This method is used to play a card from the player's hand onto the game table. It takes three parameters: the index of the card in the player's hand, the position on the table where the card will be placed, and the side of the card.
      Parameters:
      indexHand - The index of the card in the player's hand.
      position - The position on the table where the card will be placed.
      side - The side of the card.

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(String nickname, boolean gold, int onTableOrDeck)
      Draws a card for the player. This method is used to draw a card for the player. It takes three parameters: the nickname of the player, a boolean indicating whether the card is gold, and an integer indicating whether the card is drawn from the table or the deck(-1 deck, o or 1 for table).
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      gold - A boolean indicating whether the card is gold.
      onTableOrDeck - An integer indicating whether the card is drawn from the table or the deck.
